head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate ¶ * ¶ of Expenditure during the ¶ Quarter ¶ ¶ ending ¶ ¶...

div.p: V81/2937, unit 1223, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M. MS is undated, and has been dated on the basis that these forms were generally signed the day after M wrote them.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the
Quarter
ending
June 30th
1 881.

cell.p:
Collector for Flora Australiensis
That is, for the proposed supplement, never issued.
